Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Establishes a program to purchase fresh produce from farms in the state for incarcerated individuals
Summary: Directs the commissioner of corrections and community supervision to establish a program to purchase fresh produce from farms located in the state and distribute such fresh produce to correctional facilities in the state to be utilized in the provision of wholesome and nutritious food to incarcerated individuals.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to establishing a program to purchase fresh produce from farms in the state for incarcerated individuals
